message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I know will be incredibly valuable to your business. My asking price is $1,400,000, which leaves room for negotiation. I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $1,300,000 to see if we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This price reflects the product's true value and leaves room for both of us to be satisfied. Let's work together to finalize this deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1,325,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise and allows us to move forward.
